caption:
Want fuller-looking brows? We’ve got the secrets ⬇️

If you’ve got thinning hair, this can be caused by wax build up preventing nutrition from reaching the follicle. This wax can’t be dissolved by using water, but it can be dissolved by using oil. 

Or, do you have brittle hairs in your lashes or brow that won’t curl or fall in line with your other hairs? This means the oil gland at the root of the hair has dried up, leaving your lash or brow hair brittle and dry 🙅🏽‍♀️

At @bombaybeautyco, we’ve developed a Brow & Lash Rejuvenator to clean & clear your hair probs with nutrient-rich, plant-based oils. After a few days you’ll notice softer, luscious brows and lashes. Ask to try it at your next brow appointment!
